characterDescription:
Brightness Tavinar is the wife of Brightlord Tavinar and the mother to Eylita.
She attends a feast at Lin Davar's home with her husband and daughter at which, as observed by Shallan, they look as if they wished they'd never accepted the invitation.
Shortly thereafter, she and her husband raise their glasses of wine hesitantly in honor of Lin Davar's announcement of his projected betrothal to Malise Gevelmar. After a period of silence, they clap politely, looking more uncomfortable than they had previously.
